scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p www && cp index.html manifest.json www/ && cp -r css js assets www/
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.run:android: npm run sync:android && npx cap run android
scripts.run:ios: npm run sync:ios && npx cap run ios
